function.name: getAirlinePriceToDestinationForSeason
function.description: Given a desired location, airline, and approximate time of year, retrieves estimated prices.

airline.description: The name of an airline that flights can be booked on.

time.description: An approximate time of year at which travel is planned.

function.name: getPreferredAirlineForSeason
function.description: Given a season like winter or spring, retrieves the user's preferred airline carrier.

function.name: getFavoriteVacationDestination
function.description: Retrieves the user's unambiguously preferred location for vacations.

function.name: getAirlinePriceToDestinationForSeason
function.description: Given a desired location, airline, and approximate time of year, retrieves estimated prices.

airline.description: The name of an airline that flights can be booked on.

time.description: An approximate time of year at which travel is planned.

function.name: getPreferredAirlineForSeason
function.description: Given a season like winter or spring, retrieves the user's preferred airline carrier.

function.name: getFavoriteVacationDestination
function.description: Retrieves the user's unambiguously preferred location for vacations.

RequestBody.content: Assuming both my usual preferred vacation spot and favorite airline carrier, how much would it cost to fly there in September?

text.value: Assuming both my usual preferred vacation spot and favorite airline carrier, how much would it cost to fly there in September?
